title: XPCOM error
content: Hello, after a recent update, I keep getting this error when trying to open Thunderbird: "couldn't load XPCOM. How can I fix this error? Thank you.
creator: cslalonde7

title: Deciphering a group email
content: I received an email where I am part of a "grouped email" that the sender created. How do I expand the group email to see the other email addresses included in the group?
creator: yankj49

title: Scam or junk emails
content: I receive lots of junk or scam emails. I don't open them in order to make sure nothing negative happens. I'm constantly close to running out of storage space due to all these daily emails. My question is: is there a way to safely block or unsubscribe from these emails without clicking on them (opening them)? I right click on them in Thunderbird but don't see a suitable option. Also, I haven't ever deleted my junk folder, and I know there are emails in there that I need, so I can't periodically delete the junk folder (at least not for foreseeable future). I'd be very appreciative of any help! Thanks in advance.
creator: frende3

title: There are NO e-mails after changing 'Password' and kept asking 'password' over, over again
content: Hello: There are four(4) different e-mail accounts on my Thunderbird and asking 'New Password' in the rectangular box popping up. I changed one of my passwords(main account) by accessing my provider(Xfinity). However, when I attempted to access my e-mail. there is no e-mails and kept asking 'Password' which I typed a rectangular box popping up in the middle of the screen. Also, there is NO Thunderbird when opening-up Thunderbird. Just 'octopus' figure I can see. How to access my e-mail(one of my accounts...main account)? Thanks a help in advance.
creator: aelmo

title: There is NO my e-mail account on the left-side of pane on Thunderbird
content: Hello: There is no account on Thunderbird after password glich. I did twice 'install' Thunderbird in hope I can get Thunderbird back to its life, however there is no account, ..... @comcast on Thunderbird. Only I can see is 'address book,' etc which I do not need. I want to e-mail on my main account, ....@comcast.net. Prior to this happened. there are four e-mail accounts on the left side pane, but there is none showing up. Thanks for any help in advance.
creator: aelmo

title: thunderbirdが受信はしますがメール送信ができません。画面に表示されません。
content: Thunderbirdのメール受信はできますが送信ができません。 Thunderbirdのパソコンの画面に表示されません。
creator: m6819345
